title: Make Garen's Villain mechanic apply to clones as well
body:
It's my utter grief as a Shaco main, that Garen's ult passive is like a permanent ward on me in a fight. It makes it impossible to outplay people, simply because it reveals the real Shaco/Wukong/Leblanc instantly. There's no way to guard against it. This has made Garen something that Shaco players will have to permaban, because it prevents any kinds of attempts at outplaying people with a clone.

I would gladly accept Garen nuking the crap out of my clone with ease over semi-permanent "THIS IS THE REAL SHACO" over my head. I'd at least be able to escape. But no, with the Villain mechanic as it currently is, It's worse than dealing with a Rek'sai when you're trying to gank/escape as a stealth champ. Rek gets instant "Stealthed person is here" if you're moving while she's burrowed.

But Garen has a global "THIS IS REAL SHACO LOL TOO BAD" which is more than unfair. It's downright Game breaking for Shaco, it renders his ult useless.

I feel like that's kind of the point. Have you seen bad shacos? They (I) leave their (my) clone standing there while they control shaco. Good shacos can micro their clone to attack the enemy from behind, or play mind games and run their clone around while they attack from behind. The whole *point* of these clone champs is that they create mind games where you have to guess which is which by behavior. If you can just click on one and instantly know if it's the clone, that's too much counterplay, IMO. It's like an easier version of the villain mark.

Then use their behavior to decide which is the real one. That's kind of the idea of the clone. Being able to quickly discern between the clone and the real champ would completely take away from the whole point. This is coming from someone who doesn't even like clone champions.

Honestly, why have a clone at all if all the enemy has to do is left click EITHER one, see they don't/do have a debuff and just kill the real champ right away? That completely takes away from any cool outplays clone champs can do and essentially ruins the thought process behind a clone champ entirely.
